tool.name: SAGA.sim_ihacres.1
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayTABLE False isArrayDATE_Field False isArrayDISCHARGE_Field False isArrayPCP_Field False isArrayTMP_Field False output_data_TABLEout $output_data_TABLEout output_data_TABLEparms $output_data_TABLEparms output_data_TABLEsettings $output_data_TABLEsettings name SAGA.sim_ihacres.1 TABLE $TABLE DATE_Field $DATE_Field DISCHARGE_Field $DISCHARGE_Field PCP_Field $PCP_Field TMP_Field $TMP_Field USE_TMP $USE_TMP AREA $AREA CFAC $CFAC TwFAC $TwFAC STORAGE $STORAGE IHACVERS $IHACVERS SNOW_TOOL $SNOW_TOOL WRITEALL_TS $WRITEALL_TS prefer $prefer response $response outputType_TABLEout $OutputSection_TABLEout.outputType_TABLEout transmissionMode_TABLEout $OutputSection_TABLEout.transmissionMode_TABLEout outputType_TABLEparms $OutputSection_TABLEparms.outputType_TABLEparms transmissionMode_TABLEparms $OutputSection_TABLEparms.transmissionMode_TABLEparms outputType_TABLEsettings $OutputSection_TABLEsettings.outputType_TABLEsettings transmissionMode_TABLEsettings $OutputSection_TABLEsettings.transmissionMode_TABLEsettings

param.name: TABLE
param.label: Table
param.help: Table The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: DATE_Field
param.label: Date Column
param.help: Select the column containing the Date The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: DISCHARGE_Field
param.label: Streamflow Column
param.help: Select the Column containing Discharge Values The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: PCP_Field
param.label: Precipitation Column
param.help: Select the Column containing precipitation Values The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: TMP_Field
param.label: Temperature Column
param.help: Select the Column containing Temperature Values The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: USE_TMP
param.label: Using temperature data?
param.help: If checked, then temperature data are used.

param.name: AREA
param.label: Area of the Watershed in [km2]
param.help: Area of the Watershed in [km2] used for unit conversion

param.name: TwFAC
param.label: (Tw) wetness decline time constant
param.help: Tw is approximately the time constant, or inversely,the rate at which the catchment wetness declines in the absence of rainfall

param.name: STORAGE
param.label: Storage
param.option: Two Storages in Series !!! not yet implemented !!!

param.name: SNOW_TOOL
param.label: Using the snow-melt module?
param.help: If checked, snow-melt module is used.

param.name: WRITEALL_TS
param.label: Write all calculated Time Series in a table?
param.help: If checked, then a second output table with all Time Series data is created.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_TABLEout
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

section.name: OutputSection_TABLEparms
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

section.name: OutputSection_TABLEsettings
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

tool.help: The Rainfall-Runoff Model IHACRES <br/> <br/> <br/>Reference: <br/> <br/>Jakeman, A.J. / Hornberger, G.M. (1993). <br/>How Much Complexity Is Warranted in a Rainfall-Runoff Model? <br/>Water Resources Research, (29), NO. 8 (2637-2649) <br/> <br/>Croke, B. F. W. et al.(2004).<br/>A dynamic model for predicting hydrologic response to land cover changes in gauged and ungauged catchments. <br/>Journal Of Hydrology 291(1-2): 115-131.
